trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The skeleton can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Suave Defense
entries: While the skeleton is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

trait.name: Defensive Flourish.
entries: The skeleton use your Bardic Inspiration to cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target he hit. The damage equals the number he roll on the Bardic Inspiration die. Skeleton also add the number rolled to your AC until the start of your next turn.

trait.name: Mobile Flourish.
entries: The skeleton use your Bardic Inspiration to cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target he hit. Skeleton can also push the target up to 5 feet away from he, plus a number of feet equal to the number you roll on that die (round up). Skeleton can then immediately use your reaction to move up to your walking speed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target.

trait.name: Slashing Flourish.
entries: Skeleton use your Bardic Inspiration to cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target you hit and to any other creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you. The damage equals the number you roll on the Bardic Inspiration die.

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The skeleton has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
entries: When skeleton engage in two-weapon fighting, he can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes three attacks: two with its rapier or dagger and he uses a blade flourish.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.
If the target is a creature, skeleton can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target.

action.name: Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.
If the target is a creature, skeleton can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target.

action.name: Blade Flourish - Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.
* Defensive Flourish.
* Mobile Flourish.
* Slashing Flourish.

action.name: Blade Flourish - Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.
* Defensive Flourish.
* Mobile Flourish.
* Slashing Flourish.

action.name: Death Bolt (Recharge {@dice 6})
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}49 ({@damage 10d8 + 4}) necrotic damage.

Swashbucklers are charming ne'er-do-wells who live by their own codes of honor. They crave notoriety, often indulge in romantic trysts, and eke out livings as pirates and corsairs, rarely staying in one place for too long.

bonus.name: Command Undead
entries: The skeleton targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The skeleton adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the skeleton must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
